title: Should the U.S. Issue a Digital Dollar, Which Could Compete With Crypto Assets?
sub_head: President Biden ordered federal agencies to study the implications of a government-backed digital currency
body:
President Bidenâ€™s executive order on cryptocurrencies directs his administration to consider the potential implications of a U.S. digital dollar, which would be backed by the Federal Reserve.
The Fed is already evaluating the possibility of a digital currency, which some other countries, including China, have already adopted.
